patient_info: Ovarian cyst,Abnormal vagina morphology,Abnormality of the breast,Cafe-au-lait spot,Accelerated skeletal maturation,Premature thelarche,Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia,Monostotic fibrous dysplasia,Pain,Increased serum estradiol,Decreased circulating follicle stimulating hormone concentration,Decreased circulating luteinizing hormone level,Enlarged tonsils,Increased size of nasopharyngeal adenoids,Metrorrhagia,Enlarged uterus
golden_diagnosis: McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic
predict_diagnosis:
1. McCune-Albright Syndrome (MAS)
2. Polyostotic Fibrous Dysplasia with Hormonal Disturbances
3. Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome (PCOS) with associated Fibrous Dysplasia
4. Congenital Adrenal Hyperplasia (CAH) with secondary Fibrous Dysplasia
5. Marfan Syndrome with Ovarian Cyst and Skeletal Abnormalities
6. Turners Syndrome with Fibrous Dysplasia and Hormonal Imbalance
7. Peutz-Jeghers Syndrome with Gynecologic and Endocrine Abnormalities
8. Endocrine-Disrupting Pseudo-Tumor Syndrome with Fibrous Dysplasia
9. Hereditary Leiomyomatosis and Renal Cell Cancer (HLRCC) with Ovarian Cysts and Fibrous Dysplasia
10. Rhabdoid Tumor Predisposition Syndrome (RTS) with Hormonal and Skeletal Manifestations

Please note that the given patient's phenotype has strong similarities with McCune-Albright Syndrome, which is a genetic disorder characterized by polyostotic fibrous dysplasia, cafe-au-lait spots, and endocrine overactivity. However, a comprehensive differential diagnosis includes other rare diseases that can present with a combination of gynecologic, skeletal, and endocrine manifestations.
